title: Navigating Cultural Chasms: Exploring and Unlocking the Cultural POV of Text-To-Image Models. (arXiv:2310.01929v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Text-To-Image (TTI) models, exemplified by DALL-E and StableDiffusion, have recently gained prominence for their remarkable zero-shot capabilities in generating images guided by textual prompts.
